citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:45 AM on 04-Aug-
2022. Inspector arrived at the premises and attempted contact by ringing the doorbell and calling the licensee. No contact
was made within 30 minutes and the inspector left.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:45 AM on 04-Aug-
2022. Inspector arrived at the premises and attempted contact by ringing the doorbell and calling the licensee. No contact 
was made within 30 minutes and the inspector left. 
 
 
 
End Section
